mil.emp3.api

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.Camera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICamera, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition

    public class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICamera
    This class provides the Camera functionality. It encapsulates a GeoCamera.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode

        org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera()
      This default constructor creates a GeoCamera.
      Camera(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera camera)
      This constructor creates the Camera with the iGeoCamera encapsulated within.

    • Method Detail

      • copySettingsFrom

        public void copySettingsFrom(ICamera from)
        Description copied from interface: ICamera
        This method copies all settings from the camera object provided. The settings copied are the coordinates, altitude, altitude mode, tilt, roll, range and azimuth.
        Specified by:
        copySettingsFrom in interface ICamera
        Parameters:
        from - An object that implements the ICamera interface.

      • addCameraEventListener

        public EventListenerHandle addCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener listener)
                                           throws EMP_Exception
        Description copied from interface: ICamera
        This method adds an event listener to the camera.
        Specified by:
        addCameraEventListener in interface ICamera
        Parameters:
        listener - A reference to a class object that implements the ICameraEventListener interface.
        Returns:
        The handle to the event registration. See EventListenerHandle
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(EventListenerHandle listenerHandle)
        Description copied from interface: ICamera
        This method must be used to remove the registration from the system.
        Specified by:
        removeEventListener in interface ICamera
        Parameters:
        listenerHandle - The handle returned by the call to addCameraEventListener. See EventListenerHandle

      • setTilt

        public void setTilt(double value)
        This method sets the tilt on the camera. If this camera is the current camera on any map, it will change the view on the map.
        Specified by:
        setTilt in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera
        Parameters:
        value - The tilt angle in degrees.

        Specified by:
        getTilt in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera
        Returns:
        The current tilt in degrees.

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(double heading)
        This method sets the cameras heading. Setting this value on a camera that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setHeading in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera
        Parameters:
        heading - The new heading in degrees from north.

      • getHeading

        public double getHeading()
        This method retrieves the current azimuth from the camera.
        Specified by:
        getHeading in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera
        Returns:
        The azimuth in degrees from north.

      • setAltitudeMode

        public void setAltitudeMode(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode value)
        This method set the altitude mode for the elevation setting. Setting this value on a camera that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setAltitudeMode in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode
        Parameters:
        value - The new altitude mode. See IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode

      • setLatitude

        public void setLatitude(double value)
        This method sets the latitude of the camera position. Setting this value on a camera that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setLatitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Parameters:
        value - The latitude in degrees. The value must be -90.0 and 90 degrees. Values outside of this range are ignored.

      • getLatitude

        public double getLatitude()
        This method retrieves the current latitude from the camera.
        Specified by:
        getLatitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Returns:
        The current latitude in degrees.

      • setLongitude

        public void setLongitude(double value)
        This method sets the longitude of the camera position. Setting this value on a camera that is associated with a map will cause the map to change its viewing area.
        Specified by:
        setLongitude in interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
        Parameters:
        value - The longitude in degrees. The value must be -180.0 and 180.0 degrees. Values outside of this range are ignored.
